title: Wish I could write more and provide evidence in the report section.
body: I literally had this anivia intentionally feed my gangplank, using vulgar language all game, following me around throwing up walls in my way so I couldn't leave base and then telling the other team to report me, and it was just the most annoying game I think I may have played in my whole league career and probably nothing is going to be done about it. That's ridiculous.

replies.body:
first, i feel bad for your situation. but feeding your GP????? INST THAT GOOD FOR YOU?
I really Don't find any point of this post..... your talking about a regret you had and how you want to provide more info?
Send a letter to rito

> [{quoted}](name=breakordoom444,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=dFRJ5c8h,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-19T08:29:18.052+0000)
>
> first, i feel bad for your situation. but feeding your GP????? INST THAT GOOD FOR YOU?
> I really Don't find any point of this post..... your talking about a regret you had and how you want to provide more info?
> Send a letter to rito

Nooooo, feeding the gangplank I was fighting against and was just toxic all game. I screen shotted it the whole time and have it in the highlights. How would I contact them? I really want this person to be brought to justice.
